name: ST0F_00.BIN
original:
<NEXT>I was hoping you'd
come by--<NEXT>there's something
I'd like to ask your
help with...<NEXT>A little while ago,
this little kid
with a yellow face<NEXT>came up to me and
told me that he'd<NEXT>dropped something
Downtown...<NEXT>I didn't really
understand what he
said to me--<NEXT>he said he'd
dropped three
things, and<NEXT>that we'd all
better run, or
something...<NEXT>I'm not sure what
it all means, but<NEXT>I've got a hunch
something's not
right...<NEXT>Could you go check
things out for me?<NEXT>Thanks, and good
luck![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0][0x88]f[0x0][0xa2][0x0][0x12]3[0x8f][0x0]8Inspector
"Have you found out
anything, MegaMan?<NEXT>Keep looking![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0][0x88]f[0x0][0xa2][0x0][0x12]3[0x8f][0x0]8Inspector
"Oh, it's you,
MegaMan!<NEXT>I saw the report
about the bombs--<NEXT>we're lucky you
found them all<NEXT>before they went
off! You saved the
city--again!<NEXT>Thanks for helping
us![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0][0x88]f[0x0][0xa2][0x0][0x12]3[0x8f][0x0]8Inspector
"Oh, it's you,
MegaMan!<NEXT>Who would have
thought that<NEXT>that little kid had
planted bombs in
the city?<NEXT>I'm sorry--I never
should have gotten
you involved in<NEXT>something like
that...<NEXT>Well...[0x87]8[0x0]Come by and
see us again
sometime...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0][0x88]f[0x0][0xa2][0x0][0x12]3[0x8f][0x0]8Flustered man
"Oh no...Oh dear...<NEXT>What should I

"Hey, MegaMan...<NEXT>I could use your
help with
something...<NEXT>A man came to us
saying he's lost
the money<NEXT>he was going to use
to build his house
--poor fellow!<NEXT>I'd like you to see
if you can find<NEXT>the bag this fellow
dropped...<NEXT>The owner of the
bag is out there
in the lobby--<NEXT>you should go talk
to him.[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0][0x88]f[0x0][0xa2][0x0][0x12]3[0x8f][0x0]8Flustered man

left it?<NEXT>I'm pretty sure
I had it<NEXT>when I went to the
electronics shop...<NEXT>I've been saving
for years so I
could build<NEXT>my dream house,
too...<NEXT>Ohhhh, what'm I
gonna do?[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0][0x88]f[0x0][0xa2][0x0][0x12]3[0x8f][0x0]8"Wait...That bag...

death thinking
about what my wife<NEXT>would do to me if
she found out what
had happened!<NEXT>As a reward, let me
give you some of
the money...<NEXT>What? You say you

least accept this,
as thanks from me.<NEXT>[0x8a][0x86][0x0]You got:
